abstract: Season 2 Eps. 10-13 (Each episode runs for 23 mins.) Ep. 10 Walkabout--Ep. 11 Men in khaki--Ep. 12 Skin deep--Ep. 13 Rear windows
description: Episode of Series "Crash zone". Episode 10: Virgil the A.I. manifests himself within a robotic body and runs away from Catalyst. The kids must track him down before Alex finds out he's gone. Episode 11: Army Intelligence raid the offices of Catalyst looking for Virgil. The team does all they can to save him from conscription. Episode 12: To her fury, Pi discovers her father is exploiting her on the Net to further his acting career and sets out to show him how she feels. Episode 13: When a game Ram has conquered on the Net turns out to be a scenario for a real-life kidnapping, the team must stop a band of criminals from adopting Ram's strategy. Cast includes Paul Pantano, Cassandra Magrath, Nikolai Nikolaeff, Frances Wang, Damien Bodie, Nicki Wendt and Matthew Parkinson. Teaching resources can be found at: http://www.actf.com.au/learning_centre_new/Learning_frameset.htm Accompanying website at: www.crashzone.tv
